subject: [plant-fur] docs: align spec and brief with implementation
body:
Changes based on review:
- ID format: base36 timestamp + random (not ULID)
- type: singular field (not types array)
- blocked_by: computed, not stored
- config.json: removed (projects emerge organically)
- index.md: added to spec
- archive/: added to spec
- docs/: added to spec and brief
- Role prefixes: added @assist and @coder to CLAUDE.md

Updated implementation checklist to reflect current state.
title: [plant-fur] docs: align spec and brief with implementation
